archimate:BusinessFunction.name: (Business Function) Service Product
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
FunctionalPattern: Fulfill
Fulfill any scheduled and ad-hoc obligations under a service arrangement, most typically for a financial product or facility. Example: Perform the scheduled (e.g. statements, standing orders) and ad-hoc/requested (e.g. balance inquiries, fund transfers) fulfillment tasks for a customer current account facility.
